original_title: The Labyrinth ou L'album de famille
overview: Feature film made in 8 days, the idea being to follow the winding path of the life of an artist-producer from Montmartre to La Rochelle, thinking through La Dordogne and La Vendée.By skilfully mixing the professional sphere and intimacy. By showing the present moment but also projecting into fiction.
title: The Labyrinth ou L'album de famille
